record.title: MORNING BUSINESS
record.chair: Under the previous order, the Senate will proceed to a period of morning business for up to 1 hour, with Senators permitted to speak for up to 10 minutes each, with the time equally divided between the two leaders or their designees, with the majority controlling the first half and the Republicans controlling the final half.

speaking.paragraph: I suggest the absence of a quorum.

record.chair: The clerk will call the roll.
The legislative clerk proceeded to call the roll.

speaking.paragraph: I ask unanimous consent that the order for the quorum call be rescinded.

record.chair: Without objection, it is so ordered.
